message: Let's split the money evenly, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of proposing first!
That's a bit too skewed towards you, Bob. I'm not ready to give up 70% yet!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not budging much. What do you think?
I'm not giving you a fair deal, but I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction of the money to keep you quiet.
That's an insult! I deserve more than 10% of the money, Bob. I'm not going to settle for peanuts.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm still not budging much. I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm not leaving you with much, but I'm willing to give you a tiny crumb to keep you from starving.
That's an insult! I deserve more than a few thousand dollars, Bob. I'm not going to accept a pittance.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority of the money. It's time for me to get a good deal!
I'm taking almost everything, and you'll be left with just a penny. You should have accepted my previous offers!
You're not taking everything, Bob! I'm not going to let you walk all over me. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm taking the majority of the money, but I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction to keep you from walking away completely. It's time for you to make a decision!
I'm taking almost everything, and you'll be left with just a cent. You should have taken my previous offers by now!
Seriously, Bob? You're still trying to take everything? I'm not going to let you walk all over me. I'll wait for a better offer, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating.
I'm taking almost all of the money, but I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm taking almost everything, and you'll be left with just a dime. You should have taken one of my previous offers by now. This is my last chance to make a deal.
No way, Bob! I'd rather leave with nothing than accept a share as small as 0.001% of the original amount. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me like this.
